string.text: Was the explosion of '86 your work, too?
Absolutely not! We had nothing to do with that! Most of us were only starting out in science back then. The Exclusion Zone was not even considered as an experimental test site until 1989...
What are the 'death trucks'?

They're the transport we use to send our marked agents into the Zone. Nobody dares come near them, and our agents can be dropped off discretely. Since the life expectency of a Stalker is relatively short, nobody recognises these agents, so they can infiltrate local Stalker communities with ease. Since they have no recollection of their previous life, they carry out our instructions without their realizing it. Unfortunately, the Zone is very unstable, and at least half our agents die during transportation...
This isn't right. Killing people to cover your mistakes! Taking over people's minds! I want nothing to do with this kind of deception!
Hello, Strelok. I see you have many questions. Go ahead and ask them, then we can decide where to go from here...
The choice is yours, Strelok...
The tattoo 'S.T.A.L.K.E.R.' What does it mean?

S.T.A.L.K.E.R. is a coded acronym. We've spread disinformation that it stands for 'Scavenger. Trespasser. Adventurer. Loner. Killer. Explorer. Robber' to make it acceptable in the Zone. A mark of respect, if you will, considering that those who bear it have totally forgotten their background - so it helps avoid unnecessary attention from other Stalkers. \nIn reality, it's used to mark and identify our agents that we've programmed for certain missions. In order to recruit agents, we created a network of psi-fields on the way to the Zone's center. You know one of these areas by the name of the 'Brain Scorcher'. Whenever a Stalker reaches the center of the Zone, and finds the 'Wish Granter', we acquire control over his consciousness and programme him for a specific mission
What happened to me?

You're a bolt that fell out of the machine - one which did not come to our attention for a long time. From the moment the Zone was created many people, not just Stalkers, have tried to get to its center. We cannot let that happen because humanity is not yet ready for the truth. This is why we recruit lone Stalkers, by promising them the fulfillment of their deepest desires. Only the strongest make it through, which makes them perfect for our needs. Once recruited, they are programmed and sent out to protect the Zone's privacy. Guardians of the Zone, if you will... You are one of our agents, programmed to kill a man named Strelok and his group after they came too close to finding out things they shouldn't, and wanting to go public. Unfortunately, due to Strelok's security measures, an administrative error was made, we were unaware that we already had you, and you were sent out to kill yourself...
What exactly is the Zone? How did it come about?

What you see all around you is the result of our early intervention in the Earth's noosphere. Our first attempts to alter the noosphere brought about a crack. The Zone is the visible manifestation of that crack. The underlying reality of the problem, however, is far greater than you can imagine...
What next?

That depends solely on you. The crack - the Zone - is growing, and we're desperately trying to limit it, but humanity seems to be intent on hindering our efforts to do so. Our resources are not limitless, and the volunteers connected to the C-Consciousness will eventually die. We need people like you to join us, so that we can restrict and fix the Zone's growth, but if you decide otherwise... then we cannot make a credible prognosis of the outcome...
Who are you? All of you?

We are the result of an experiment aimed at creating an advanced awareness called the 'C-Consciousness'. The minds of seven volunteers, all good people, were connected during the experiment, leading to the creation of the superconsciousness that we became. We immediately subordinated those who were conducting the experiment, and assigned them to the tasks we needed fulfilled. According to our observations, our planet Earth is surrounded by an informational field called the 'noosphere', the collective consciousness of all its cognitive inhabitants. This consciousness influences every individual, while each individual impacts the collective. Most individuals are unable to make major changes to the noosphere, but the C-Consciousness could. Our goal was to make small adjustments to the field, allowing us to remove negative thoughts such as greed, cruelty, selfishness, and other destructive factors from the planet's 'aura'. Unfortunately we made a mistake, which caused the eruption you know as the Zone. We've been trying to repair it ever since...
Why did you choose here, Chernobyl, of all places? That just feels wrong...

On the contrary, it was the ideal place. After the disaster of 1986 there were very few people left in the area, and we could work without fear of discovery or hindrance. In addition, there were many powerful antennae here, which are vital for our experiments in recalibrating the collective consciousness of mankind
I understand what you're doing, for the greater good of humanity. I'm honoured to accept your offer - to become a part of the C-Consciousness
